thread.section_title: Hotel Trinite Haussmann - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Wonderful
thread.title_full: Wonderful - Review of Hotel Trinite Haussmann, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: JohannaETYassine
title: Wonderful
text:
It was the perfect match for our spring-patis trip. There was a problem with the hot water but the hotel, it's manager and it's staff dealt with it in the highliest professional manner to our satisfaction. The room was super clean, beautifully designed and well equiped.
The bed was comfortable aswell as the covers and pillows. The room was cleaned everyday.
The seemingly noisy street was cut off through the windows closed which gave us a sound sleep and a good rest.
The locations is quite perfect for everything with it's aproximity to montmartre, opera and gare du nord.
We would recommend the hotel for sure and would love to come back. I am a frequent paris visitor.
